notes: U.S. citizen refers to U.S. citizens and permanent residents. Non-U.S. citizen refers to temporary visa holders. Due to rounding, percentages may not sum to 100.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
